description.items: An nested array of items containing: id, label, active, ancestor, children(bool = async loading, or array), href, style, class.
description.direction: Modifier for basic direction. Accept values: 'vertical', 'horizontal.'
description.includeToggle: Tells wheter to include toggle button to expand childs or not. Accept values: true, false.
description.allowStyle: Allow the use of style parameter in this menu (item.style = 'button')
description.depth: Internal depth indicator, should not be used.
